titleStmt.title: To JANE OCTAVIA BROOKFIELD,Jane Octavia Brookfield (1821-96), n√©e Elton, novelist, niece of the Whig historian Henry Hallam's wife. Married well-known preacher, public reader and witty conversationalist Rev. William Henry Brookfield (1809-74). Close friend of W.M. Thackeray 1846-51. [20 FEBRUARY 1863]
titleStmt.bibl: Charles Dickens Letters Project, ed. Leon Litvack, Katie Brandt, Emily Bell, and Jeremy Parrott (London: Dickens Fellowship), DickensLetters.com.

sourceDesc.p: Envelope only, text from facsimile in Albion Auctions online catalogue, September 2017.
